text.text: [Pure White Reaper] 10 kill, cdr time reduce to 10s
[Pure White Reaper] 20 kill, aim time reduce to 2s
[Pure White Reaper] 30 kill, cdr time reduce to 5s, your snipe kill will recover 1hp
[Pure White Reaper] 40 kill, aim time reduce to 1.5s
[Pure White Reaper] The White Death Back to the field
